main.name: Mandeepkaur Saini
main.bio: Hello, I'm Mandeepkaur! I'm an inquisitive person who likes to learn lots of different things, a problem-solver who challenges everything, and a diligent worker who doesn't take life too seriously and celebrates the simple things.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hil

education.degree: Post Grad Diploma in Business Management

work.title: Administrative Assistant
work.description: Provided primary customer support to internal and external customers in a fast-paced environment. Maintained customer satisfaction with forward-thinking strategies focused on addressing customer needs and resolving concerns. Cultivated customer loyalty, promoted repeat customers, and improved sales.

work.title: General- Manager
work.description: Managed budget implementations, employee reviews, training, schedules, and contract negotiations for the franchise. Organised and achieved margin targets consistently to stay on track with growth plans and preparing forecasts with the help of pace reports .

work.title: Assistant Manager
work.description: Created organisation systems for financial reports, and schedules, dramatically increasing operational efficiency. Delegated daily tasks to team members to optimise group productivity. Conducted weekly staff meetings to motivate staff members, address concerns and questions, plan improvements, and evaluate progress toward goals.

projects.title: Team Profile Generator
projects.category: Using Node.js and it's modules to create a generated HTML team profile to demonstrate OOP and TDD.

projects.title: Workout Tracker
projects.category: An App to track workouts, build with MongoDB to Heroku with help of MongoDb Atlas connected a database.

projects.title: Budget Tracker
projects.category: Application that allows users to add expenses and deposits to their budget with or without a connection.

projects.title: Book Search Engine
projects.category: Refactoring Google search API using REST API to use GraphQL and Apollo.(MERN-Stack application)

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.category: This application is retrieving data from another application's API and using it in the context of displaying weather of different cities.

projects.title: Express.js-Note-taker
projects.category: This application was created to allow users to read, write, save, and delete notes.

projects.title: Work Day Scheduler
projects.category: This application uses third-party API and JavaScript to create a calendar-style scheduler allowing users to save events for each hour of the day.

projects.title: Code-Quiz
projects.category: This app will run in the browser and will feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript code.
